text: allāh obava vaḷakvannē, dharma kāraṇāvanhi oba samaga yuddha kaḷa aya samagada, obagē nivesvalin obava piṭamaṁ kaḷa aya samagada, obava piṭamaṁ kirīmehi (saturanṭa) udav kaḷa aya samagada, oba mituran vaśayen nosiṭiya yutuya yanuveni. ebævin kavurun ovun samaga mituru saban̆dakam pavatvannōda, ovun aparādhakārayinya
